name: TI_2_1_2_2_User_Authentication_to_the_System__Start_user_session__Security_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.2.2 User Authentication to the System (Start user session) Security Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track user authentication to the system (start user session).
purpose: Capture user authentication to the system (start user session), both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.2#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence of user authentication at logon (start session).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.2#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.2#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.2#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.2#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.2#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.2#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).

statement.label: TI.2.1.2.2#08
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the method of user authentication (e.g., user ID, password, biometrics, token, security question(s)).
